events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because I do not want to keep this product.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund as the customer is requesting money back for an incorrect order.
Support agent Jane D. has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer regarding the incorrect item delivery.
Hello! I understand you received the wrong product and would like to help you with the refund process as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a photo of the item you received? This will help us verify the issue faster.
Here is my order number 1234567 and attached is a clear photo showing the wrong item that was delivered to me.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email once the transaction is complete.
I appreciate your quick response and look forward to receiving my refund soon. Thanks for the help!
The refund has now been processed successfully. Please allow a few business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to make sure you have received your refund and to see if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing your case now since your refund was confirmed and no additional questions were raised. Thank you for contacting support.
We’ve sent you a short survey to understand your satisfaction with our refund process. Your feedback is important to us.
